content: <p style="text-align: center; "><br></p><p style="text-align: center; "></p><p style="margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 15px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px;">Children in orphanages do not always have the resources to get a good education. EduCare is&nbsp;<span style="font-size: 1rem;">a secure, decentralized platform that enables people to collectively raise funds to academically&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 1rem;">sponsor these orphan children. Our platform partners with orphanages and allows donors to&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 1rem;">fund money for school fees, to buy things like notebooks, stationary, uniforms, etc. It also&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 1rem;">provides donors to keep track of the children’s progress.</span></p>
